issues.message: JTBD "so that" clause may not describe clear benefit
issues.suggestion: Focus on outcomes: trust, confidence, autonomy, efficiency, etc.

Connect in person without creating a dig.jtbd_text: When I see someone attractive at an event, I want a natural way to start a conversation, so that I can connect without appearing desperate or being rejected publicly.

issues.message: JTBD "so that" clause may not describe clear benefit
issues.suggestion: Focus on outcomes: trust, confidence, autonomy, efficiency, etc.

Signal interest to someone nearby.jtbd_text: When I find someone attractive at an event, I want to know if they're interested before approaching, so that I only pursue connections where interest is mutual. Evidence: Research shows "Meet someone new, reduce rejection risk" (Universal JTBD) Observable Signals: Mutual handshake count, declined signals invisible (privacy-preserved)

Confirm mutual interest and connect.jtbd_text: When I find someone attractive, I want to confirm mutual interest privately, so that I feel confident to connect with dignity and mutual respect. Evidence: Research shows "Meet someone new, reduce rejection risk" (Universal JTBD) Observable Signals: Mutual handshake count, non-mutual signals remain invisible

Confirm partner's health status before m.jtbd_text: When I'm considering intimacy with someone I just met, I want to confirm their health status without an awkward conversation, so that I can proceed confidently or decline gracefully without ruining the connection. Evidence: Research shows "Verify partner's health status, privately" (Universal JTBD) Observable Signals: Health credential verification count, zero verbal status discussions - ≥90% of users trust the verification is authentic

Protect my reputation from stigma and ru.jtbd_text: When I attend events for social/sexual connection, I want to protect my reputation from stigma or rumor, so that I participate confidently without fear of exposure. Evidence: Research shows "Protect my reputation from stigma or rumor" (Universal JTBD) Observable Signals: No reputational data stored, all metrics aggregated not personal - ≥85% of users trust platform with sensitive health information

issues.message: JTBD "so that" clause may not describe clear benefit
issues.suggestion: Focus on outcomes: trust, confidence, autonomy, efficiency, etc.

Complete connections in seconds with min.jtbd_text: When someone shows interest in connecting, I want to confirm and exchange contact quickly, so that I don't lose the opportunity while they're still engaged. Evidence: Research shows "Minimize time and steps to connect authentically" (Universal JTBD) Observable Signals: Time-to-connection <3s, zero app switching, one-tap completion - ≥95% of users rate system reliability as "dependable
